edge: Josh Brolin plays the role of Jonah Hex, a disfigured bounty-hunter who is the film's anti-heroic protagonist.
John Malkovich portrays Quentin Turnbull, the main antagonist who murdered Jonah Hex's family and disfigured the former.
Megan Fox appears as Lilah Black, a gun-wielding prostitute and Jonah's love interest, whose real name is Tallulah Black.
Michael Fassbender essays the character of Burke, a bowler-hat-wearing, tattooed and psychopathic Irishman who is Turnbull's right-hand man.
Will Arnett portrays Lieutenant Grass, a Union soldier who enlists Hex as a bounty-hunter.
Michael Shannon appears as Dr. Cross Williams, the ringleader of a gladiator circus.
Aidan Quinn features in this production for only 3 days, portraying Ulysses S. Grant, the 18th President of the United States.
Aidan Quinn portrayed Ulysses S. Grant in a previous role, but appeared as Jonah Hex in this movie for only three days due to scheduling conflicts.
Smith supplies Hex with new weapons in the movie.
Jonah Hex interacts with Lieutenant Evan in the movie.
Jonah Hex interacts with Colonel Slocum in the movie.
Jonah Hex interacts with Cassie in the movie.
Before Josh Brolin was cast as Jonah Hex, Thomas Jane attempted to secure the role by undergoing a makeup transformation.
Thomas Jane voiced Jonah Hex in the 2010 animated short DC Showcase: Jonah Hex.
